results.title: Six-month effects of early treatment with lisinopril and transdermal glyceryl trinitrate singly and together withdrawn six weeks after acute myocardial infarction: the GISSI-3 trial. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto Miocardico.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: At 6 months, among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ randomized to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, 18.1% died or developed severe @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018754 @@@ventricular dysfunction@@@ versus 19.3% of those randomized to no @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (2p = 0.03).

citations.NLM: Six-month effects of early treatment with lisinopril and transdermal glyceryl trinitrate singly and together withdrawn six weeks after acute myocardial infarction: the GISSI-3 trial. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto Miocardico. J Am Coll Cardiol. 1996 Feb;27(2):337-44. PMID: 8557903
citations.BibTeX: @article{8557903, title={Six-month effects of early treatment with lisinopril and transdermal glyceryl trinitrate singly and together withdrawn six weeks after acute myocardial infarction: the GISSI-3 trial. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'Infarto Miocardico.}, journal={J Am Coll Cardiol}, volume={27}, number={2}, pages={337-44}}

results.title: GISSI-3: effects of lisinopril and transdermal glyceryl trinitrate singly and together on 6-week mortality and ventricular function after acute myocardial infarction. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'infarto Miocardico.
results.text_hl: Overall 6-week @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@mortality@@@ was 6.7%. @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, started within 24 h from @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@ symptoms, produced significant reductions in overall @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@mortality@@@ (odds ratio 0.88 [95% CI 0.79-0.99]) and in the combined outcome measure of @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@mortality@@@ and severe @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018754 @@@ventricular dysfunction@@@ (0.90 [0.84-0.98]).

citations.NLM: GISSI-3: effects of lisinopril and transdermal glyceryl trinitrate singly and together on 6-week mortality and ventricular function after acute myocardial infarction. Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'infarto Miocardico. Lancet. 1994 May 7;343(8906):1115-22. PMID: 7910229

Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio della Sopravvivenza nell'infarto Miocardico.}, journal={Lancet}, volume={343}, number={8906}, pages={1115-22}}

results.title: Connective tissue and the heart. Functional significance and regulatory mechanisms.
results.text_hl: Experimental and clinical findings with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive heart disease@@@, where @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cardiac fibrosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018754 @@@abnormal ventricular stiffness@@@ are present, indicate that such cardioreparation should be a targeted objective of pharmacologic intervention.

citations.NLM: Burlew BS, Weber KT. Connective tissue and the heart. Functional significance and regulatory mechanisms. Cardiol Clin. 2000 Aug;18(3):435-42. PMID: 10986582
citations.BibTeX: @article{10986582, title={Connective tissue and the heart. Functional significance and regulatory mechanisms.}, author={Burlew BS and Weber KT}, journal={Cardiol Clin}, volume={18}, number={3}, pages={435-42}}
